message.content:
The possible ethical issues that AI could face when programmed with human-like creative abilities include:

1. Intellectual Property Rights: As AI programs create content, there could be concerns surrounding the ownership of intellectual property rights for their creations since those generated works can neither solely exist under human-authored nor machine-generated work.

2. Bias and Discrimination: AI models may incorporate unintentional biases from existing data or systems—leading to potentially biased decision-making or discriminatory results in its output.

3. Privacy Violations: An intrusion into personal privacy is possible when algorithms utilize personal information (data) without consent to generate novel content (AI-based content generation using user photos or writings as input).

4. Plagiarism / Copyright Infringement: AI systems might recombine existing ideas and produce derivative works posing challenges concerning copyright infringement if copyrighted material forms part of the source stimuli during any creation process.

5. Authenticity and Originality: The authenticity of an artwork can be compromised as machines reproduce numerous iterations bearing subjective resemblance to one another, causing a devaluation effect on unique artistic endeavors typically credited to humans by reproducing variations instead of truly original pieces.

6. Unethical Uses & Content: There is potential for misuse of these capabilities towards generating harmful, offensive, malicious, or deceitful content which goes against social norms and values

7. Job Losses & Economic Impacts– Human artists' careers may be affected due to competition with AIs capable of producing high-quality work very quickly at lower costs; this raises questions about economic consequences tied up with such shifts within labor markets dominated previously primarily by humans across all creative fields involved relying upon creativity

8. Moral responsibility - Who will be held accountable morally/legally for unintended harms caused by AI's autonomous "creative decisions
